kannada_original: ಕೇಡಿಗೊಂದೇ ದಾರಿ : ಅದು ಅಮಿತ ಅತಿ ಆಸೆ!
english_transliteration: Kēḍigondē dāri : adu amita ati āse!
english_translation: There is only one path to ruin: that is immoderate, excessive desire!
Do not suffer by getting caught in this hook.

kannada_original: ಮುದಜಲದ ಕರೆ ಮರೆತು ಏಕೆ ಬರಿ ಆಯಾಸ ?
english_transliteration: Mudajalada kare maretu ēke bari āyāsa ?
english_translation: Forgetting the call of joy-water, why just toil?
Do not become a fish for the net – Muddu Rāma.
